Package com.example.fairdraw.DBs

Class EntrantDB

java.lang.Object
com.example.fairdraw.DBs.EntrantDB
public class EntrantDB extends Object
Firestore helper for operations on the "entrants" collection.

Provides asynchronous CRUD operations and helpers for pushing notifications into an entrant's notifications array.

    • getEntrantCollection

      public static com.google.firebase.firestore.CollectionReference getEntrantCollection()
      Returns a CollectionReference pointing to the "entrants" collection.
      Returns:
      collection reference for entrants

    • getEntrant

      public static void getEntrant(String deviceId, EntrantDB.GetEntrantCallback callback)
      Asynchronously fetch an Entrant document by device id.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - document id (device id)
      callback - callback to receive the Entrant or null on failure

    • addEntrant

      public static void addEntrant(Entrant entrant, EntrantDB.AddEntrantCallback callback)
      Create a new Entrant document.
      Parameters:
      entrant - Entrant to create (document id is entrant.getDeviceId())
      callback - callback invoked with success flag on completion

    • updateEntrant

      public static void updateEntrant(Entrant entrant, EntrantDB.UpdateEntrantCallback callback)
      Update an existing Entrant document.
      Parameters:
      entrant - Entrant object with updated values
      callback - callback invoked with success flag on completion

    • deleteEntrant

      public static void deleteEntrant(String deviceId, EntrantDB.DeleteEntrantCallback callback)
      Delete an Entrant document by device id.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - document id to delete
      callback - callback invoked with success flag on completion

    • listenToEntrant

      public static com.google.firebase.firestore.ListenerRegistration listenToEntrant(String entrantId, EntrantDB.GetEntrantCallback callback)
      Attach a real-time snapshot listener for a single entrant document.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - id of the entrant to listen to (usually deviceId)
      callback - callback that receives Entrant updates
      Returns:
      ListenerRegistration handle which can be used to remove the listener

    • pushNotificationToUser

      public static void pushNotificationToUser(String deviceId, EntrantNotification notification, EntrantDB.PushNotificationCallback callB)
      Push a single notification into a user's notifications array. If the field does not exist this method will create it.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - target user's device id
      notification - notification to push
      callB - optional callback to receive operation result

    • addEventToHistory

      public static void addEventToHistory(String entrantId, String eventId, String initialStatus, EntrantDB.SimpleCallback callback)

    • updateEventHistoryStatus
